Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash -ev
cat << EOF > /etc/systemd/system/actions-static-site-infra.service
[Unit]
Description=Static Site service

[Service]
Environment="BUCKET=

"
Environment="PORT=9000"
ExecStart=/actions-static-site-infra

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

aws s3 cp s3://

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.groupDescription: Allow outbound traffic from wazuh agent to manager
Automatically created Security Group for ELB StaticSiteINFRALoadBalancerActionsstaticsiteinfraA0CD502C

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.alarmName: High 5XX error % from actions-static-site-infra in INFRA

metrics.label: % of 5XX responses served for actions-static-site-infra (load balancer and instances combined)

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.alarmDescription:
actions-static-site-infra's instances have failed healthchecks several times over the last 1 hour.
      This typically results in the AutoScaling Group cycling instances and can lead to problems with deployment,
      scaling or handling traffic spikes.

      Check actions-static-site-infra's application logs or ssh onto an unhealthy instance in order to debug these problems.
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.alarmName: Unhealthy instances for actions-static-site-infra in INFRA

securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: ALB DNS name for static sites.
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /INFRA/deploy/actions-static-site-infra/loadBalancerDnsName
